abstract: There are 30 percent fewer billionaires in the world now, according to Forbes. Prince Walid bin Talal, the Saudi royal who has taken a hit from his Citigroup investment, would like you to know he is still one of them.
snippet: There are 30 percent fewer billionaires in the world now, according to Forbes. Prince Walid bin Talal, the Saudi royal who has taken a hit from his Citigroup investment, would like you to know he is still one of them.
lead_paragraph: There are 30 percent fewer billionaires in the world now, according to Forbes. Prince Walid bin Talal would like you to know he is still one of them.

headline.main: Walid Trumpets Billionaire Status Amid Turmoil
